string 1: Reduces SP cost for physical attack skills by 10%.
Slightly boosts CP gained.

Recovers HP equal to 10% of physical attack skill damage
dealt.
Performs an additional attack when Extra Strikes is activated.
Always acts first.

Boosts {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_016)} ATK for the first 3 rounds. (The earlier the round,
the greater the boost to {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_016)} ATK.)
Boosts {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_030)} CRT Rate by 5%.
Boosts DEF based on user's HP.

Boosts {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_016)} ATK when HP is 90% or lower. (The lower the HP,
the greater the boost to {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_016)} ATK.)

Chance of countering  with an Attack when being attacked.
(The lower the HP, the greater the chance to counter.)
Reduces SP cost for recovery skills by 10%.

Also recovers 10% of target's Max SP when using skills to
recover an ally's HP.
Always acts last.
Slightly recovers HP of all allies at the start of each round.

Boosts {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_020)} INT from round 4 onward. (The more rounds pass,
the greater the boost to {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_020)} INT.)

Also removes target's {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_012)} Injury when using skills to recover
an ally's HP.

Boosts {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_018)} DEF when HP is 90% or lower. (The lower the HP,
the greater the boost to {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_018)} DEF.)
Revives with 50% HP when KO'd (once per battle).
Always acts first.

Overheals to up to 200% of target's Max HP when using
recovery skills.

At start of battle, boosts {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_016)} ATK and {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_020)} INT for all allies
based on the total Bond of all battle members.
Boosts the probability rate of skill debuff effects.
Boosts {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_016)} ATK based on user's HP.

Extends the duration of buff effects applied by the user's
skills by 2 turns.

Extends the duration of debuff effects applied by the user's
skills by 2 turns.

Boosts damage dealt by the user when hitting an enemy
weak point after an ally does.
Boosts {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_030)} CRT Rate by 5%.

Also boosts all of target's stats when using skills to recover
an ally's HP.

Boosts {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_016)} ATK from round 4 onward. (The more rounds pass,
the greater the boost to {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_016)} ATK.)

At start of battle, reduces {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_019)} DEF and {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_023)} SPI for all enemies
based on the total Bond of all battle members.
Reduces SP cost for magic attack skills by 10%.
Attacking deals magic damage.

Boosts {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_020)} INT when HP is 90% or lower. (The lower the HP,
the greater the boost to {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_020)} INT.)
Recovers SP equal to 10% of magic attack skill damage dealt.
Always acts last.
Slightly recovers SP of all allies at the start of each round.
Boosts CRT damage by 20%.

Boosts {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_020)} INT for the first 3 rounds. (The earlier the round,
the greater the boost to {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_020)} INT.)
Boosts {is28}{image(ui_icon_btlStatus_022)} SPI based on user's HP.

Chance of activating skill again when using a magic attack
skill. (The lower the HP, the greater the chance.)
